data.title: The 3 different equals
data.content:
<p>What is the difference between <code>=</code>, <code>==</code>, and <code>===</code>?</p>

<p>I think using one equal sign is to declare a variable while two equal signs are for a comparison condition and lastly three equal signs are for comparing values of declared variables.</p>
